Implementation class for permission services.

rafael

getAllVisibleGroups

public java.util.Collection<Group> getAllVisibleGroups()
Description copied from interface: PermissionService
Returns all the visible groups for the logged user. For members / brokers / operators, it's the same as PermissionService.getVisibleMemberGroups(). For admins, those who have the permission to manage other admins or to view admin groups, will also include all admin groups.

Specified by:
getAllVisibleGroups in interface PermissionService

getManagedMemberGroups

public java.util.Collection<MemberGroup> getManagedMemberGroups()
Description copied from interface: PermissionService
Returns the managed member groups for the logged user. It works like this:
  • For administrators, the result is AdminGroup.getManagesGroups()
  • For members, the result is only his own group
  • For brokers, as brokers could potentially manage members in any visible groups (its a per-user relationship), all visible groups are returned
  • For operators, it's only his owner's group
  • For system, all member groups

Specified by:
getManagedMemberGroups in interface PermissionService

getPermissionCatalogHandler

public PermissionCatalogHandler getPermissionCatalogHandler(Group group)
Description copied from interface: PermissionService
This method must be used only for group permission's edition

Specified by:
getPermissionCatalogHandler in interface PermissionService
Parameters:
group - the group to which edit the permissions
Returns:
a handler for all multivalued group's permissions

getVisibleMemberGroups

public java.util.Collection<MemberGroup> getVisibleMemberGroups()
Description copied from interface: PermissionService
Returns the visible member groups for the logged user. It works like this:
  • For administrators, the result is AdminGroup.getManagesGroups()
  • For members / brokers, the result is MemberGroup.getCanViewProfileOfGroups()
  • For operators, is his owner group's MemberGroup.getCanViewProfileOfGroups()
  • For system, all member groups

    • Specified by:
    getVisibleMemberGroups in interface PermissionService

Specified by:
getVisibleMemberGroups in interface PermissionServiceLocal
Parameters:
addLoggedMemberGroup - If false, the group of the logged user isn't added to the result.
Returns:

manages

public boolean manages(Element element)
Description copied from interface: PermissionService
Returns whether the logged user can manage the given element. Manage means one of the following:
  • The current invocation is a system task LoggedUser.isSystem()
  • The logged user is the same as the given element
  • The logged user is the broker of the given element
  • The logged user is the member and the element is one of its operators
  • Both logged user and the given element are administrators, and logged user has permissions over other administrators
  • The logged user is administrator with permission to manage the given element's group, being the given element a member
  • if the logged user is an operator, and the element is the member to which it belongs

Specified by:
manages in interface PermissionService

manages

public boolean manages(Group group)
Description copied from interface: PermissionService
Returns whether the logged user can manage the given group. If the group is an admin group, the logged user must be an admin with either AdminAdminPermission.ADMINS_REGISTER or AdminAdminPermission.ADMINS_CHANGE_PROFILE permissions. If the group is a member group, checks whether it is returned by PermissionService.getManagedMemberGroups(). Finally, for operator groups, only their owner can manage them.

Specified by:
manages in interface PermissionService

permission

public PermissionCheck permission()
Description copied from interface: PermissionService
Returns a PermissionCheck, which can be used to enforce the logged user's permissions which are not related to an specific user.

Specified by:
permission in interface PermissionService

permission

public PermissionCheck permission(Element element)
Description copied from interface: PermissionService
Returns a PermissionCheck, which will, besides of checking static permissions, ensure that the logged user is allowed to manage the given Element, according to PermissionService.manages(Element)

Specified by:
permission in interface PermissionService

permission

public PermissionCheck permission(Group group)
Description copied from interface: PermissionServiceLocal
Returns a PermissionCheck, which will, check permissions for the given group

Specified by:
permission in interface PermissionServiceLocal

relatesTo

public boolean relatesTo(Element element)
Description copied from interface: PermissionService
Returns true if the logged user is related to the given element. Related to means one of the following:
  • The logged user manages the given element, according to PermissionService.manages(Element)
  • The logged user is a member with permission to view the profile of the given member, according to MemberGroup.getCanViewProfileOfGroups()
  • Both the logged user and the given element are operators of the same member

Specified by:
relatesTo in interface PermissionService
